com.servise.impl

Class FileServiseImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.servise.impl.FileServiseImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FileService

    public class FileServiseImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements FileService
    Created by Колян on 25.05.15. Counts size of directory and scanning it Writes report and file names in file by means of instance of ReportWriter
